Question: After extensive investigation over several years, no indictments were made against the ____s related to the years in Arkansas.
Hints: This person came out for gay marriage in July 2009 and urged the Supreme Court to overturn DOMA in 2013.
Altogether, this person has spoken at the last six Democratic National Conventions, dating to 1988.[dated info].
Many Democrats who had supported Ronald Reagan and Bush in previous elections switched their support to this person.
